results.content:
I can't tell what language the instructor is speaking. It sounds like English, but even the Udemy Caption feature can't tell what the instructor is speaking.

Udemy should allow all instructors to correct all the incorrect words in the caption files for every lecture. And the instructor should have corrected all the incorrect words in the caption feature, or he should have supplied a PDF file with the correct transcripts from every single lecture. Then I could have read the written words while watching the videos.
